description: The woman and man are standing in a living room, holding hands and smiling at each other.
text:
Jack: Do you remember when I asked you to marry me in this exact spot?
Lilah: How could I forget?

description: The woman and man are kneeling on the ground, surrounded by boxes.
text:
Lilah: I can't wait to start our new life together.
Jack: Me too.

description: The woman and man are standing in front of a house, holding the keys.
text:
Jack: Welcome home, Mrs. Jenkins.
Lilah: I can't believe this is ours.

description: The woman and man are sitting on a couch, watching TV.
text:
Lilah: This is the best night ever.
Jack: I agree.

description: The woman and man are lying in bed, asleep.
text:
Lilah: (thought bubble) I couldn't have asked for a better partner.
Jack: (thought bubble) I'm so lucky to have found her.
